enable_rtl.label: Enable RTL
enable_rtl.info: Switch the layout direction to right-to-left for languages like Arabic or Hebrew.

rtl_languages.label: Languages support RTL
rtl_languages.info: Enter [ISO language codes](https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php), separated by commas. Leave blank to apply to all languages.

transparent_logo.info: Effective when transparent page is enabled

transparent_collections_templates.label: Collections templates
transparent_collections_templates.info: Separate multiple templates with commas. Leave blank to apply to all collection templates.

transparent_pages_templates.label: Pages templates
transparent_pages_templates.info: Separate multiple templates with commas. Leave blank to apply to all page templates.

background_gradient.label: Gradient background
background_gradient.info: Set a gradient background color for more dynamic visuals.

paragraph_page_scheme.content: Configure the global color scheme of the website pages

color_success.label: Success color
color_success.info: Indicates successful operation or normal status

color_error.label: Error color
color_error.info: Indicates failed operation or error message

color_warning.label: Warning color
color_warning.info: Alerts the user to something that needs attention or action

type_heading_font.label: Font
type_heading_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_decorative_font.label: Font
type_decorative_font.info: Artistic fonts are best chosen in script or non-traditional styles to enhance creativity and uniqueness in design.

card_low_stock_threshold.label: Low stock threshold
card_low_stock_threshold.info: Set the stock level below which the low stock label will be displayed

new_badge_tag.label: New badge tag
new_badge_tag.info: Effective when the new label basis is set to 'Tag'

new_product_days.label: New product days
new_product_days.info: Set the number of days after a product is considered new. Effective when the new label basis is set to 'Publish Days'. Products published within this time frame will be marked as 'New'

enable_preorder_badge.label: Enable pre-order badge
enable_preorder_badge.info: When the pre-order badge is enabled, the product page will also display the pre-order button (if the product meets the pre-order conditions)

paragraph_custom_badge.content: Add tags to products in the format _Custom Badge

search_popular_keywords.label: Popular search keywords
search_popular_keywords.info: Separate multiple keywords with a comma

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

free_shipping_threshold.label: Free shipping threshold
free_shipping_threshold.info: Enter an integer amount in the store's default currency; converts automatically for other currencies.

enable_free_shipping_confetti.label: Enable confetti celebration effect
enable_free_shipping_confetti.info: Confetti celebration effect will be triggered when the cart reaches the free shipping amount

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32 px

enable_browser_tab_flash.label: Enable browser tab flashing
enable_browser_tab_flash.info: Switch the browser tab title to attract attention when the page is inactive

show_view_more.label: Show view more
show_view_more.info: If the product list exceeds the limit, this link will be displayed

paragraph_content.content: Up to 5 images can be displayed

placeholder.label: Placeholder text
placeholder.info: Displayed when the field is empty

options.label: Options
options.info: Enter options separated by commas, e.g., Option 1, Option 2, Option 3

paragraph.content: Category metafields are Shopify built-in metafields under the 'shopify' namespace. For more details, please refer to [Category metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/category-metafields).

The key value of metafields can be set and viewed through the 'Settings' > 'Metafields' area in the Shopify admin. For more details, please refer to [Custom Metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields).
Displayed in the vertical filter in the sidebar

paragraph_highlight.content: Wrap text in *italics* to apply animated highlight

end_time.label: End time
end_time.info: End time format: yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm, e.g., 2024-05-01 12:25, uses store's timezone settings, [Modify store timezone](/admin/settings/general)

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other code to create advanced customizations. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/liquid)

link.label: File link
link.info: Please upload the file first to get the link

custom.label: Custom metafield
custom.info: Enter the namespace and key for the metafield containing the value (e.g., custom.in_box_items).

truncate.label: Truncate title
truncate.info: Truncate the title if it exceeds the maximum length

video.label: Video
video.info: Recommend uploading 10-15 second short videos to optimize loading speed and experience.

video_url.label: Embed video url
video_url.info: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

if_as_main_area.label: As main first screen area
if_as_main_area.info: If set as the main first screen area, it will be optimized to improve SEO score. Learn more about [LCP](https://web.dev/articles/lcp)

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave blank to hide the button

paragraph.content: You need to configure discount information in the discount settings.[Learn more](https://webvista-studio.gitbook.io/krank/sections/product-and-collection/shop-the-look#discount-settings)

type.label: Recommendation type
type.info: Smart recommendations will automatically suggest related products based on recent browsing history.

map.label: Google map embed code
map.info: Use the format <iframe></iframe>. For detailed instructions, refer to [How to get embed map code](https://help.shopify.com/zh-CN/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/pages#add-content).

show_collection_image.label: Show category image
show_collection_image.info: Show the first product image of category

target_id.label: Bound menu order
target_id.info: Use this index to link a menu. Starts from 1, indicating the order from left to right.

heading.info: Leave empty to use the selected menu's title

limit.info: Limit number of products displayed in each collection

paragraph_content.content: All images bound in menu will follow size settings of first added image

width_percentage.info: Image width as percentage of remaining space

height_percentage.info: Image height as percentage of remaining space

header_follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

header_localization.info: To add languages, go to your [Language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

adapt_mobile_navbar.label: Adapt mobile nav bar
adapt_mobile_navbar.info: Add bottom spacing to avoid overlap

paragraph.content: To show your social media accounts, add their links in [Theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).
To display the cart drawer, please go to [Template Settings](/editor?context=theme&category=cart) and select "Drawer" as the cart type in the cart settings.

show_complementary.label: Show complementary
show_complementary.info: Display products related to the most recently added cart item. Add [Complementary products](https://webvista-studio.gitbook.io/krank/pages/main-product/complementary-products) to items first

image_height.info: Adaptive height will match the height of the tallest media.

speed.label: Speed
speed.info: The distance moved per second, in px

font_weight.label: Font weight
font_weight.info: Font weight options depend on the chosen font family; some fonts support fewer weights

map_image.label: Map image
map_image.info: If no map code is added, this image will be shown,800 x 600px .jpg recommended.

map_iframe.label: Google map embed code
map_iframe.info: Use the format <iframe></iframe>. For detailed instructions, refer to [How to get embed map code](https://help.shopify.com/zh-CN/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/pages#add-content).

delay.label: Delay time
delay.info: Delay not applicable in edit mode

image.info: Recommended size 360 x 480px .jpg format. To comply with Google's interstitial ad guidelines and improve SEO, will not show on mobile.

debug_mode.label: Enable debug mode
debug_mode.info: Forces age verifier popup to show on every refresh, for editing purposes only. Ensure to disable [Debug mode](https://webvista-studio.gitbook.io/krank/popups/age-verification-popup) when publishing store.

product.label: Preview product
product.info: Note: preview product is only for testing layout and styles

anchor_id.label: Anchor id
anchor_id.info: Enter an in-page anchor id (e.g. product-details)

enable_close.label: Enable close button
enable_close.info: Allow users to close the info card

auto_dropdown.label: Auto switch style
auto_dropdown.info: Automatically switches to a dropdown picker when the number of options exceeds the threshold below, keeping the page cleaner

enable_first_swatch_image.label: Display variant image
enable_first_swatch_image.info: Show variant image for the first swatch option

auto_scroll_to_top.label: Auto scroll to top
auto_scroll_to_top.info: Automatically scrolls to the top when the variant image changes.

is_selector_standalone.label: Display quantity selector on its own line
is_selector_standalone.info: Will automatically wrap if the screen is narrow

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout button
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Displays the checkout button alongside the add-to-cart button

show_notify_form.label: Show back in stock notify
show_notify_form.info: Displays when the product is out of stock and not available for pre-order

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show gift card recipient field
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Allows the buyer to send the gift card directly to a recipient

inventory_threshold.label: Inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: Set the threshold to trigger low stock alert

low_stock_alert.label: Low stock alert
low_stock_alert.info: Use [stock] to display the current stock quantity

full_stock_alert.label: Full stock notice
full_stock_alert.info: Use [stock] to display the current stock quantity

paragraph.content: Bind sibling products from same series together for display, see [How to create sibling products](https://webvista-studio.gitbook.io/krank/pages/main-product/sibling-products)
Display products that pair well with the current product.

quantity_sync.label: Quantity sync
quantity_sync.info: When enabled, the quantity of bundled products will sync with the main product

product.info: You need to add the associated warranty product first

hide_variants.label: Hide other variant images
hide_variants.info: Use the alt attribute to group images by variants, allowing you to display relevant images for the selected variant and hide others. For more details, please refer to the [Product Page](https://webvista-studio.gitbook.io/krank/pages/main-product/variant-images-group)

hide_thumbnail_mobile.label: Hide thumbnails on mobile
hide_thumbnail_mobile.info: Effective when the media layout is set to carousel.

paragraph_content.content: Related articles display other articles that share the same tags.

default_collection_image.label: Default image
default_collection_image.info: If the collection does not have an image set, this image will be used.A 1920 x 600px .jpg is recommended.

default_collection_image.label: Default image
default_collection_image.info: If the collection does not have an image set, this image will be used.A 800 x 500px .jpg is recommended.

enable_filtering.label: Enable filtering
enable_filtering.info: Customize filters with the Search and Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

limit.info: Set number of items displayed per page
